webPage.name: Free Job Posting Platform | Flowxtra USA
webPage.description: Post unlimited US jobs for free with Flowxtra. Distribute every vacancy to Google Jobs, LinkedIn, Facebook, and top American job boards from one dashboard with no contracts or credit cards.

mainEntity.name: How many free jobs can I publish in the United States?

acceptedAnswer.text: Flowxtra allows unlimited job listings on the Free Forever plan for US recruiters. Publish roles for marketing, retail, healthcare, tech, and more without caps.

mainEntity.name: Does Flowxtra syndicate to American channels?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes. With one click you can push openings to Google Jobs, LinkedIn, Facebook, and dozens of American job boards popular with US candidates.
